TextBody:
Hello Vaneet,

I hope all is well with you.  Could you also let me know on which platform your EPP Server is hosted please?

Can we schedule a remote session for Thursday at 2:30 Pm IST?  Please let me know if this time does not work for you and we can reschedule.



Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption

Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #414452 - Virtual Image Resources Optimization

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000CpJ1i:ref

We are using Endpoint Protector 5.8.1.0 virtual image, and unable to take access through SSH protocol. we need root credentials to extend/ Attach external HDD configuration also need to install the EDR/ Zabbix agent on server for monitoring.
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #414452 - Virtual Image Resources Optimization

TextBody:
Hi Vaneet,

Thank you for confirming the details.  Regarding the SSH credentials to the back-end of the appliance, only the Endpoint Protector support team have these credentials as it is allowing access to the sensitive back-end part of our product.
We can provide you with these credentials only on the basis that there is a signed agreement - disclaimer in place.  This can be arranged by your Customer Success / Account Manager.  For our session I can access the back-end of the server via these SSH credentials.


Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer

TextBody:
Hi Vaneet,

Thank you for your time on our call earlier today.

We have optimized one of your EPP servers on today's call, the EPP server was optimized for 8 CPU cores, 8GB RAM for 1000 endpoints.  Please do let us know the Server ID for one that is completed.

For the second EPP Server that needs to be optimized, prior to our next remote session please allocate the same resources as you did for the first Server. Please also provide us with the Server ID for the second Server.

Please allocate the following resources.

	8 CPU cores
	8GB RAM
	1 TB Disk Space

Can we schedule our next remote session for the optimization of the second Server on Monday 15h July, at 15:30 IST?


Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer
